text: Reda Bellahcene (born January 21, 1993 in Schiltigheim) is a French-Algerian football player who is currently playing for DRB Tadjenanet in the Algerian Ligue Professionnelle 2. ==Club career== ===USM Alger=== Reda Bellahcene, a defensive midfielder of 23 years who currently plays at Saint-Louis Neuweg, French club CFA. Formed in Strasbourg He spent his first professional contract with the champions of Algeria for three years, Bellahcene, who was tenured on 26 occasions in 30 matches so far with St. Louis who finished the season in eighth place in the Group B of the CFA should be an additional asset in the midfield usmiste already expanded by experienced players. ==Personal== ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|CupIncludes the Coupe de France and Algerian Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="4" valign="center"|Schiltigheim |2012–13 |rowspan=3| CFA 2 |2||0||colspan=2|—||colspan=2|—||colspan=2|—||2||0 |- |2013–14 |24||2||1||0||colspan=2|—||colspan=2|—||25||2 |- |2014–15 |16||0||0||0||colspan=2|—||colspan=2|—||16||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !42!!2!!1!!0!!colspan=2|—!!colspan=2|—!!43!!2 |- |rowspan="2" valign="center"|Saint-Louis Neuweg |2015–16 |CFA |26||0||2||0||colspan=2|—||colspan=2|—||28||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !26!!0!!2!!0!!colspan=2|—!!colspan=2|—!!28!!0 |- |rowspan="2" valign="center"|USM Alger |2016–17 |Ligue 1 |1||0||0||0||0||0||1||0||2||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !1!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0!!2!!0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !69!!2!!3!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0!!73!!2 |} ==Honours== ===Club=== ; USM Alger * Algerian Super Cup (1): 2016 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:People from Schiltigheim Category:French footballers Category:Algerian footballers Category:French people of Algerian descent Category:FC Saint-Louis Neuweg players Category:French expatriate sportspeople in Algeria Category:USM Alger players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Algerian Ligue Professionnelle 1 players Category:Footballers from Alsace
